description: This Java class defines a generic data transfer object (DTO) named PagedResponse, used to encapsulate paginated responses in a backend API. It includes fields for items, pagination info, and total count, along with constructors and accessor methods.

classes.name: PagedResponse
classes.description: A generic container for paginated API responses, holding a list of items, pagination info, and total count.

methods.name: PagedResponse
methods.description: Default constructor for the PagedResponse class.

methods.name: PagedResponse
methods.description: Parameterized constructor initializing the paged response with items, page number, size, and total count.

methods.name: getItems
methods.description: Returns the list of items in the current page.

methods.name: setItems
methods.description: Sets the list of items for the response.

methods.name: getSize
methods.description: Returns the size of the page.

methods.name: setSize
methods.description: Sets the size of the page.

methods.name: getTotal
methods.description: Returns the total number of items across all pages.

methods.name: setTotal
methods.description: Sets the total count of items.
